00113 /* Convert the object-space axis-aligned bounding box (expressed as
00114  * its minimum and maximum corners) into a screen-space rectangle,
00115  * returns zero if the result is empty */
00116 int paint_convert_bb_to_rect(struct rcti *rect,
00117                              const float bb_min[3],
00118                              const float bb_max[3],
00119                              const struct ARegion *ar,
00120                              struct RegionView3D *rv3d,
00121                              struct Object *ob);
00122 
00123 /* Get four planes in object-space that describe the projection of
00124  * screen_rect from screen into object-space (essentially converting a
00125  * 2D screens-space bounding box into four 3D planes) */
00126 void paint_calc_redraw_planes(float planes[4][4],
00127                               const struct ARegion *ar,
00128                               struct RegionView3D *rv3d,
00129                               struct Object *ob,
00130                               const struct rcti *screen_rect);
